name: Good Times
description:
This is a story based (shooter?) game.

Instructions:

WASD to move 

Left click to shoot

Shift to sprint

**SPOILERS AHEAD**

Its highly recommended you play this game for yourself to figure out the story yourself.

In this game you are a drug addict, who reminisces  his childhood, or 'the good old times'.  He remembers, what all he has lost because of this addiction.  (No more spoilers than that :) )
